item.title: CVE-2024-20030|2024-03-04T02:43:41.943Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6739%2C%20mt6757%2C%20mt6761%2C%20mt6763%2C%20mt6765%2C%20mt6768%2C%20mt6771%2C%20mt6779%2C%20mt6785%2C%20mt6833%2C%20mt6853%2C%20mt6873%2C%20mt6877%2C%20mt6885%2C%20mt6893%2C%20mt8167%2C%20mt8168%2C%20mt8195%2C%20mt8512
item.description: In da, there is a possible information disclosure due to improper input validation. This could lead to local information disclosure with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS08541632; Issue ID: ALPS08541741.

item.title: CVE-2024-20075|2024-06-05T04:01:18.766Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6833%2C%20mt6853%2C%20mt6873%2C%20mt6877%2C%20mt6885%2C%20mt6893%2C%20mt8185%2C%20mt8675%2C%20mt8786%2C%20mt8789
item.description: In eemgpu, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS08713302; Issue ID: MSV-1393.
